casebody.data:
RECONSIDERATION DOCKET

97-2419. State ex rel. Ohio Academy of Trial Lawyers v. Sheward.

In Mandamus and Prohibition. Reported at 86 Ohio St.3d 451, 715 N.E.2d 1062. On motion for reconsideration by Ohio Attorney General Betty D. Montgomery. Motion denied.

Moyer, C. J., Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., dissent.
